name: Touhou LoveLine
description:
[WORK IN PROGRESS]
[Will be done in a week at most, please wait patiently]
[More characters and music coming. ??? coming]

Love was stolen all over gensokyo and now it's up to  brave little fairy and you to restore the peace! Follow fairy along, pressing buttons in rhythm to help familiar characters to follow their destiny and find their date!

Featuring:

  • 5 unlockable characters
  • 7 unlockable songs
  • Customizable audio and video delay for comfortable play

Credits:

  • EasternMouse: Programming, UI, Charting
  • Iced_Lemon: Character art
  • CYCzen: Background art
  • Muzilana: Main menu music
  • lapspider45: Sound effects

Used song credits can be viewed in game respectivelly, all contributors gave agreement to use their songs.

Post Jam additions:

  • Normal difficulty
  • Facial expressions
  • More character animations
